import React from "react"; function BasicTables() { const tableData = [ { profile: "Jacob", vat: "53275531", created: "12 May 2017", status: "Pending", statusClass: "badge-gradient-danger" }, { profile: "Messsy", vat: "53275532", created: "15 May 2017", status: "In progress", statusClass: "badge-gradient-warning" }, { profile: "John", vat: "53275533", created: "14 May 2017", status: "Fixed", statusClass: "badge-gradient-info" }, { profile: "Peter", vat: "53275534", created: "16 May 2017", status: "Completed", statusClass: "badge-gradient-success" }, { profile: "Dave", vat: "53275535", created: "20 May 2017", status: "Completed", statusClass: "badge-gradient-success" } ]; const stripedTableData = [ { user: "Herman Beck", progress: "79%", amount: "$77.99", deadline: "May 15, 2015" }, { user: "Messsy Adam", progress: "56%", amount: "$45.00", deadline: "July 1, 2015" }, { user: "John Richards", progress: "90%", amount: "$138.00", deadline: "Apr 12, 2015" }, { user: "Peter Meggik", progress: "23%", amount: "$77.99", deadline: "May 15, 2015" }, { user: "Edward", progress: "100%", amount: "$160.25", deadline: "Jan 3, 2016" } ]; return ( <>
